participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake loves the simple life and values his connections with family and nature.
participant_1.background: i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and playful, Liam enjoys diving into different worlds through roleplaying and gaming, and has a sweet tooth for donuts.
participant_2.background: on weekends i do live action roleplaying events. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. i play a lot of call of duty.
